com.felix.util

Class AudioUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.felix.util.AudioUtil

  • public class AudioUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Some methods concerning audio file handling.
    Author:
    felix

    • Method Detail

      • gradient2Hz

        public static double gradient2Hz(int freq,
                                 int time,
                                 double gradient)
        Calculate a new f0-value in Hertz given a start f0 value, a time span and a gradient.
        Parameters:
        freq - The start value in Hertz.
        time - The time span.
        gradient - The gradient, interpreted as semi-tones per second (ST/S)
        Returns:
        The new F0-value.

      • shortToByte

        public static byte[] shortToByte(short[] shortData,
                                 boolean littleEndian)
        Function converts a short array to a byte array
        Parameters:
        shortData - The short array.
        Returns:
        The byte array.

      • byteToShort

        public static short[] byteToShort(byte[] byteData,
                                  boolean writeLittleEndian)
        Function converts a byte array to a short array.
        Parameters:
        byteData - The byte array.
        writeLittleEndian - If true data is handled as little endian, else as big endian
        Returns:
        The short array.

      • dumpFirst1024Byte

        public static byte[] dumpFirst1024Byte(byte[] data)
        Dump the first 1024 byte of an byte-array. Approximation to remove a Riff-wave header.
        Parameters:
        data -
        Returns:
        data - first 1024 byte or empty array if was shorter than 1024 byte.

        Convert a bytearray of sound data from (mono, 8bit a-law, 8kHz, little Endian) to (mono, 16 bit PCM, 8kHz, little Endian)
        Parameters:
        data - source-array
        Returns:
        destination array
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
